channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Lock User Account
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Lock User Account

item.title: CVE-2023-4307|2024-08-02T07:24:04.371Z -- unknown -- lock%20user%20account
item.description: The Lock User Account WordPress plugin through 1.0.3 does not have CSRF check when bulk locking and unlocking accounts, which could allow attackers to make logged in admins lock and unlock arbitrary users via a CSRF attack
